SELECT LA.* FROM ( SELECT /* OtherPackageListMapper.searchProdListByPackageNm, Package 정보로 상품ID 조회, 오승민/인크로스,2014-03-15 */ PROD.PROD_ID, PROD.PROD_GRD_CD, RSHP.PART_PROD_ID, CONTENTS.APK_PKG_NM, CONTENTS.VM_VER AS SUPPORTED_OS, PROD.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD, TENANTPRICE.PROD_AMT, CATEGORY.TOP_MENU_ID, (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = CATEGORY.TOP_MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd} AND ROWNUM = 1) AS TOP_MENU_NM, CATEGORY.MENU_ID, CATEGORYDESC.MENU_NM, (ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CONTENTS.APK_PKG_NM ORDER BY PROD.REG_DT DESC )) AS RNUM FROM TB_DP_PROD PROD ,TB_DP_PROD_RSHP RSHP ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DEVICE ,TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS CONTENTS ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TENANTPROD ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE TENANTPRICE ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY CATEGORY ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG PRODMAPG ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC CATEGORYDESC ,TB_DP_APP_PROD APPPROD WHERE PROD.PROD_ID = DEVICE.PROD_ID AND PROD.PROD_ID = RSHP.PROD_ID AND PROD.PROD_ID = TENANTPROD.PROD_ID AND PROD.PROD_ID = APPPROD.PROD_ID AND TENANTPROD.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND TENANTPROD.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TENANTPROD.PROD_STATUS_CD = #{prodStatusCd} AND TENANTPROD.PROD_ID = TENANTPRICE.PROD_ID AND TENANTPROD.TENANT_ID = TENANTPRICE.TENANT_ID AND SYSDATE BETWEEN TENANTPRICE.APPLY_START_DT AND TENANTPRICE.APPLY_END_DT AND CATEGORY.MENU_ID = PRODMAPG.MENU_ID AND CATEGORYDESC.MENU_ID = CATEGORY.MENU_ID AND PROD.PROD_ID = PRODMAPG.PROD_ID AND CATEGORY.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PRODMAPG.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CATEGORYDESC.LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd} AND DEVICE.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceHeader.model} AND DEVICE.PROD_ID = CONTENTS.PROD_ID AND DEVICE.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = CONTENTS.SUB_CONTENTS_ID AND CONTENTS.APK_PKG_NM IN
#{item}
AND CONTENTS.VM_VER LIKE '%'||#{osVersion}||'%' /* Provisioning OS VERSION 체크 */
AND RSHP.PROD_RSHP_CD = #{rshpCd} AND (APPPROD.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD <> #{partParentClsfCd} OR APPPROD.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD IS NULL ) ) LA WHERE RNUM = 1
